members.joinCircumstances: Buggy is the founder and captain of the crew.
Mohji serves as one of Buggy's top officers.
Cabaji serves as one of Buggy's top officers.
Richie is Mohji's beast companion and fighting partner.

keyMoments.title: Funeral for Captain Buggy
keyMoments.description: The Buggy Pirates hold a funeral for their captain, believing him to be dead after his defeat at Orange Town.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's loyalty and emotional attachment to Buggy despite his often cruel leadership.

keyMoments.title: Richie Becomes Temporary Captain
keyMoments.description: After Mohji and Cabaji fight over the captaincy, Richie accidentally defeats both while sleepwalking and is crowned captain. The crew temporarily becomes the 'Richie Pirates.'
keyMoments.significance: A comedic subplot showing the chaos within the crew without Buggy's leadership.

keyMoments.title: Buggy Reunites with Crew
keyMoments.description: After rescuing them from the Kumate Tribe, Buggy is reunited with his crew and restored as captain.
keyMoments.significance: Completes the Buggy's Crew Adventure Chronicles arc and restores the normal crew hierarchy.

keyMoments.title: Buggy and Alvida Alliance Sets Sail
keyMoments.description: The Buggy Pirates, now allied with Alvida, set sail to pursue and defeat Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the ongoing threat of the Buggy-Alvida alliance.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a red clown nose and crossbones behind it
